formula: return -smin(-unionn(p.y, cube(translate(p,vec3(0., -4., 0.)), vec3(4., 4., 2.))), sphereField(p, 1.), 0.3);
return unionn(p.y, length(translate(p, vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0))) - 1.0);
return unionn(p.y, intersect(difference(length(p.xy) - 4., length(p.xy) - 3.7), cube(translate(p, vec3(0., -6, 0.)), vec3(3.,4.,5.))));
return -smin(-unionn(p.y, cube(translate(p,vec3(0., -4., 0.)), vec3(4., 4., 2.))), sphereField(p, 1.), 0.3);
return unionn(p.y, intersect(difference(length(p.xy) - 5., length(p.xy) - 3.7), cube(translate(p, vec3(0., -6, 0.)), vec3(3.,4.,5.))));
